title: VDH is worth reading
author: VD
content_html: VDH is always thought-provoking. Now that Dreher’s at the DMN, he and Nordlinger are my favorite NRO writers. I’m definitely picking up Rippes of Battle this winter.
content_text:
VDH is always thought-provoking.  Now that Dreher’s at the DMN, he and Nordlinger are my favorite NRO writers.  I’m definitely picking up
Rippes of Battle
this winter.
